paint.shared.config

Class PaintConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint.shared.config.PaintConfig

  • public class PaintConfig
extends Object
    The PaintConfig class provides a configuration management system for handling configuration data, organized into named sections and key-value pairs. The configuration is stored as a JSON file and includes methods for reading, updating, and persisting values. It supports automatic creation of default configurations and offers both static and instance-level access.

    This class follows a singleton pattern for managing a global configuration instance, accessed via instance(). It also supports initializing and switching between different configuration files.

    Key functional areas:

    • Loading existing configuration or creating defaults if missing
    • Saving configuration back to disk in pretty-printed JSON using Gson
    • Case-insensitive lookup of section names and keys
    • Typed getter and setter methods for String, int, double and boolean
    • Static convenience methods for global use

    • Method Detail

      • initialise

        public static void initialise(Path projectPath)
        Initializes the global configuration instance with the specified project path. If an instance already exists, a warning is logged if the path differs.
        Parameters:
        projectPath - the base project directory used to resolve the config file

      • reinitialise

        public static void reinitialise(Path projectPath)
        Reinitialises the global configuration instance with a new project path.
        Parameters:
        projectPath - the base project directory used to resolve the config file

      • instance

        public static PaintConfig instance()
        Returns the singleton instance of PaintConfig, initializing it if necessary with the default user-home based path.
        Returns:
        the singleton PaintConfig instance

      • remove

        public static void remove(String section,
                          String key)
        Removes a single key from a specified section (and auto-saves).
        Parameters:
        section - section name (case-insensitive)
        key - key within the section to remove (case-insensitive)

      • removeSection

        public static void removeSection(String section)
        Removes an entire section from the configuration data (and auto-saves).
        Parameters:
        section - section name to remove (case-insensitive)

      • removeValue

        public void removeValue(String section,
                        String key,
                        boolean autoSave)
        Removes a value associated with a specified key from a given section. If autoSave is true, the change is immediately persisted.
        Parameters:
        section - the section from which the key-value pair is removed
        key - the key identifying the value to remove
        autoSave - whether to immediately save changes after removal

      • removeSectionValue

        public void removeSectionValue(String section,
                               boolean autoSave)
        Removes a section from the configuration. If autoSave is true, the configuration is saved immediately after removal.
        Parameters:
        section - the name of the section to remove
        autoSave - if true, save changes immediately after removal

      • keys

        public Set<String> keys(String section)
        Retrieves the set of keys inside a specified configuration section.
        Parameters:
        section - the name of the section to read keys from
        Returns:
        a Set of key names present in that section, or an empty set if the section does not exist

      • sections

        public Set<String> sections()
        Retrieves the set of all section names present in the configuration.
        Returns:
        a Set of section names (as stored, case-sensitive representation)

      • getJson

        public com.google.gson.JsonObject getJson()
        Retrieves the full JSON configuration data as a JsonObject.
        Returns:
        a JsonObject representing the entire configuration

      • getSection

        public com.google.gson.JsonObject getSection(String section)
        Retrieves the specified section from the loaded configuration, ignoring case differences in section names.
        Parameters:
        section - the section name (case-insensitive)
        Returns:
        the JsonObject for the section if found; null if no such section exists
